abstract.text: Retrieve the standard color objects for common colors like red, blue, green, black, white, and more.

abstract.text: Construct and manage a graphical, event-driven user interface for your macOS app.

Represent colors using built-in or custom formats, and give users options for selecting and applying colors.
Load colors from asset catalogs, and create colors from raw component values, such as those used by grayscale, RGB, HSB, and CMYK colors.
Retrieve standard color objects for use with windows, controls, labels, text, selections and other content in your app.
